Caz Brunnen Front-end Developer

My Expertise

I'm a junior/mid-weight developer based in Sydney. My previous roles include a year as a front-end developer and, more recently, a year full stack. I've worked in both agency and product-based companies, utilising Agile methodologies and scrum practices. I'm a natural-born problem solver and I have a creative mind, making me a resilient and patient programmer. I have a strong work ethic and well thought out workflow. Tech plays a huge role in a user's end experience and I'm proud to be the one behind the scenes, making it all happen.

Design

Strong knowledge of HTML5, Handlebars and various front-end frameworks such as Bootstrap, and a broad experience working with CSS, SCSS and Sass

Code

I enjoy using JavaScript and jQuery. I have experience using Meteor to build complete web apps. I'm learning Unity in my spare time as I love AR and VR.

Tools

Adapt at using Git version controll within a large development team, and am proficient in MongoDB to provide data to both the front and back ends of an app.

Working Examples

Rugby Sports App

  • MongoDB
  • Handlebars
  • Moment.js

Using Meteor methods and calls to the database, this part of the popular sports app will always show the latest fixtures coming up in a competition and the user can view the ladder as it currently stands.
